data.text:
@britiburcio Hello Bridget,
We inform you that we have already replied to your private messages. Thank you

@aH9886 Hello aH,
We apologize for all the inconvenience caused. Please send us the details of your booking and your claim directly through a private message, in order for us to be able to assist. Thank you
@PSorbas For security reasons, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message. Thank you (1/1)

@PSorbas In order for us to be able to verify the situation, we kindly request that you please provide us with the PIR number (the code you received at the airport when reported the missing luggage, upon arrival). (2/2)

@PSorbas Hello Gustav,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to a high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. (1/2)

@johnny_hapiores @paulieok João, 
We inform you that we have already answered your private messages. Thank you

@nkp85uk Hello Nick,

can you inform us through DM your booking reference or electronic ticket number (047...) so we may verify? Thank you.
@willitones We have just replied to your DM, Wilson.
@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal You will need to use the form sent previously to submit the complaint. There is no email address that can be used to raise a complaint. Thank you.
@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal There is a note in your booking about the flight cancellation and the new and updated flight but the notification may have failed.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal For compensation purposes, we inform that you will need to use the following form available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. If you need any further help, please let us know. Thank you.

@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal We thank you for the details provided and regret the situation reported. According to the information present in your booking, you were notified by email or sms yesterday regarding the flight cancellation/change.

@daskgeorgia @esolidar We understand your considerations and dissatisfaction, but, please, rest assured that we are making every effort to process all the requests as soon as possible.
Once again, we thank you for your understanding and we remain at your disposal for any other questions. (2/2)

@daskgeorgia @esolidar Hello ᧁꫀꪮ᥅ᧁ꠸ꪖ,
once again, please accept our sincere apologies for the delay on the finalization of your case. (1/2)

@willitones Hello Wilson,
May you please let us know your PIR (property irregularity report) or tag number via DM? Thank you.

@JamievdW76 Hello Jamie,
May you please let us know your TAP client number and/or your email address via DM?
@snowboardboefie Hello Claudia, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@masnunes Olá Mariana, respondemos à sua mensagem privada. Obrigado.

@javaistardeb @esolidar Alex, informamos que, por esta via, não temos acesso a reclamações efetuadas no livro de reclamações. De forma a verificar a situação, pedimos que nos indique os dados previamente solicitados. Obrigado.

@sjbarnard30 Hello Sarah, we apologize for the late resolution of your file. We assure you that it is being analysed and that you will be contacted as soon as the analysis of the situation is completed. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you.

urls.title: Complaint – How can we help? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: We want you to have the best experience with TAP. Tell us about the situation so that we may resolve it or consult the status of an existing complaint.

data.text: @PeterDeWit_ We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused. To apply for compensation, we recommend that you submit the following form available on our website - https://t.co/bwFSKNcRTz. Thank you.
@darrenk3lly Hello darrenk3lly, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.
@PeterDeWit_ We hope to see you again soon and provide you with a more positive experience. Thank you for your understanding.

@PeterDeWit_ Hi! We deeply regret the situation reported. Your feedback is important and will allow us to have some insight as to where we can improve with our services in the future and exceed our customer's needs and expectations.

data.text: @IsabelleFeliu Hello Isabelle, we are deeply sorry for the situation and all constraints caused. In order to verify the status of your luggage, please provide us with the Property Irregularity Report (PIR). For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

urls.title: Reclamação – Como podemos ajudar? | TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Queremos que tenha a melhor experiência TAP. Indique-nos a situação para que a possamos solucionar ou consulte o estado de uma reclamação já efetuada.

data.text:

Recomendamos nesse caso que submeta a sua reclamação online através do seguinte link: https://t.co/ijaemUBLvf
@BhaaratVerma1 Hello Bhaarat, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@EvershedRichard @TAP_Portugal Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused. If our assistance is still needed, please send us a DM with your booking information. Thank you in advance.
@BennyFolkmann Hello Benny, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

data.text: @paoloomero Hello Paolo, we apologize for the flight cancellation. In order to verify the situation, please provide us with your booking reference or the electronic ticket number. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.
@savaflorian Bonjour Sanglier, nous avons répondu à votre message privé. Merci.
@KirstyHS290914 If you do not have the possibility to do it on a computer, please send us all the details required for the complaint online and we will submit it for you. Thank you.
@ingridlamark If you are still unable to proceed, please send us a print screen of the constraint so we can verify the situation. Let us know if we can be of further assistance. Thank you. (II/II)

data.text: @ingridlamark Hello Ingrid, we are deeply sorry for the situation. In order to submit your file, we kindly request you to clean the cookies of your browser and try to submit it via Google Chrome. (I/II)
@KirstyHS290914 Otherwise and to be able to submit the complaint on your behalf, we will need you to send us all the details you have provided online through this same channel. Thank you.

data.text:
@KirstyHS290914 Kirsty,
We have instructed you to submit the form on a laptop or a computer to avoid any problems. You are doing it on a cell phone. Please try to do it on a laptop or computer as recommended. If the error persists, please let us know.
@Quesiaman @esolidar Hello Quesia, we have replied to your message via Instagram. Thank you.
@CamilaLoliv Olá Camila, lamentamos imenso a situação e todos os constrangimentos causados. Caso possamos prestar assistência adicional, não hesite em contactar. Obrigado.
@SultoonSarah Hello Sarah, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@javaistardeb @esolidar Olá Alex, de forma a verificar a situação, pedimos que nos indique se tem um código de reclamação. Solicitamos igualmente que nos indique o seu email e código de reserva. Por razões de segurança, pedimos que nos envie os dados por mensagem privada. Obrigado.
@_Hypoo Hello Joe, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

data.text: @BridgetAntwi_ Hello Bridget, we apologize for the delay and all constraints caused. In order to verify the status of your file, please provide us with the file number and email associated. For security reasons, please send us the information via private message. Thank you.

@Kushal_Narain Kushal, we understand the situation and are deeply sorry for the late resolution of your refund. We assure you that we are verifying the situation and will contact you as soon as we have more information on your process. Thank you.
@Kushal_Narain Hello Kushal, we have replied to your private message. Thank you.

@mcknighty118 Hello Stuart,
in order to verify, please provide us the process file number and the email associated. For confidentiality reasons, we suggest you to send the details by private message. Thank you.

@el_yisus21 @esolidar Hola Jesus,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar antes. Informamos que ya hemos contestado a sus mensajes privados. Gracias

@nirmal_vp Hello Nirmal, 
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@Mirav_V @OurmieresChris Hello Mirav,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. We have already answered to our private messages. Thank you

@tschaggoman Hello chris,
please provide us the claim file number via DM in order to verify. Thank you.

@LpezGabriel Hola Rara,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Para que nos sea posible verificar su cuestión, le pedimos que nos indique su número del reclamo. Por cuestión de seguridad, le pedimos que haga el envío a través de un mensaje privado. Gracias

@joseepires Olá José,
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o código da reserva ou número de bilhete (047-XXXXXXXXXX).   
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.

@ITsValuepreneur Olá Paulo, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@JoaoGomesDias Olá João, 
De forma a verificarmos a situação, indique-nos por favor o código da reserva ou número de bilhete (047-XXXXXXXXXX).   
Por razões de privacidade, sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada.   
Obrigado.

data.text:
@AimiMcNeill @ManchesterAirp @UK_CAA @OurmieresChris Hello Aimi,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. We have answered your private messages. Thank you

@hannahmc38 @Sue_Clark1 Hello Hannah,
Regarding possible compensations, you may fill out the available claim form, through our website's contacts page. Please let us know if you have any other questions. Thank you
@rickymarshall99 Due to confidentiality reasons, we kindly request that you send the details through a private message. Thank you  (2/2)

@rickymarshall99 Hello Ricky,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. Due to the high number of messages received, it was not possible to answer any sooner. In order for us to be able to check your question, we kindly request that you please provide us with the claim file number. (1/2)

@g4nieri Hola Gabriel,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Informamos que hemos ya contestado a sus mensajes privados. Gracias

@phand00 Hello P.H.,
we have replied via DM. Thank you.

@gregoralpers Hello Gregor,
We apologize for the delay in our answer. We inform you that we have answered to your private message. Thank you

@maytecantero Hello Mayte,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. Informamos que hemos ya contestado a su mensaje privado. Gracias

@starbuck3000 Hello starbuck3000,
yes it is possible to change the language. We kindly request you to change the flag or language on the top right side of the homepage. If you need any further assistance, please let us know. Thank you.

@gustavo_ffs Olá Gustavo, 
Informamos que já respondemos à sua mensagem privada.  
Permanecemos ao dispor. 
Obrigado.

@KirstyHS290914 As already explained via DM, the form can be completed if following the steps previously mentioned. And if you encounter during the process any problems, please send us a print screen of the error to report it. Thank you.

@eikestad Hello Eikestad,
In order to assist you, please provide us the booking reference and/or the ticket number.  
For security reasons, we suggest you to send it by private message.   
Thank you.

@yodagc93 Hola Sara,
Lamentamos el retraso en contestarle. Debido al elevado número de mensajes recibidos no ha sido posible contestar más pronto. Vamos a contestar a su mensaje privado lo antes posible. Gracias

@johnny_hapiores Olá João,
Lamentamos a situação que nos reporta. Para que possamos verificar a mesma, pedimos que nos indique o código da sua reclamação. Obrigada

@FKabache Fabrice,
Comme indiqué, nous vous contacterons dès que'on a des informations supplémentaires. Merci
@baramvino We thank you for the details sent. We have now replied to your DM. Thank you.
@KirstyHS290914 We understand. To be able to assist you, please DM us the difficulties encountered. Thank you.
@baramvino We haven't received any information through this channel. If you still require our assistance regarding the issue reported, we will need your details. Thank you.
@KirstyHS290914 If you have encountered any problems during the process, please send us a print screen of it. Thank you in advance.

@KirstyHS290914 Hi! We are truly sorry for all the inconvenience and distress caused. Please let us know if you have in the meantime been able to submit your complaint online. If possible, use a computer or laptop to do so.
@baramvino Hi! We deeply regret the situation. To better assist you, please DM us your booking information or complaint number. Thank you in advance.

data.text: @bfg9090 @TAPair_Lawsuit Hi! Although we understand your urgency, your complaint is still under review. We appreciate your patience at this time. You will be contacted by email very soon. Feel free to contact us, if you have any other questions. Thank you in advance.
@jefffernandes1 @TAP_Portugal Olá! Lamentamos uma vez mais a situação reportada. Informamos que respondemos à mensagem direta que nos enviou. Obrigada.

@CamilaCandido Olá! Lamentamos desde já a demora na nossa resposta. Se ainda pudermos ajudar por esta via, pedimos que nos envie por favor uma mensagem direta com o assunto que pretende resolver ou com qualquer outra questão que possa ter. Obrigada.
@paigeandreag Hi! We have replied to your new message. Thank you in advance.
@tyler90755493 Hi! We deeply regret the delay of your luggage. To better assist you, please DM us your lost luggage file number. Thank you in advance.

urls.title: TAP Air Portugal
urls.description: Bid in TAP Air Portugal charity auctions and help Associação Portuguesa de Deficientes buy a van to transport the wheelchair basketball team athletes and their sport wheelchairs. Don't miss this fantastic opportunity to own an exclusive piece of Portuguese aviation! Be part of this charity wave promoted by TAP and help the APD athletes to overcome the obstacles that stand between them and victory! Good causes deserve our best. Bid and make a difference!

data.text: In partnership with @esolidar, 20 triple seats (15 economy class and 5 business class) that previously equipped our airplanes will be auctioned. This initiative is focused in raising funds for the Portuguese Disable Association (APD). Participate in: https://t.co/3btn5TLCCG. https://t.co/xn5iDzM6Bi
@monsaenzruiz Esperamos volver a verle pronto y ofrecerle una experiencia más positiva. No dude en ponerse en contacto con nosotros, si tiene alguna pregunta. Gracias de antemano.

@monsaenzruiz Hola,
Lamentamos sinceramente todas las molestias causadas por el retraso de sus vuelos. Sus comentarios son importantes y nos permitirán tener una idea de dónde podemos mejorar con nuestros servicios en el futuro y superar las necesidades y expectativas de nuestros clientes.

@Tiago_JP_Costa @tiago_jp_ Olá Tiago, lamentamos os transtornos causados. Pedimos que nos indique o código de reserva, por forma a verificar. Por motivos de confidencialidade sugerimos o envio por mensagem privada. 
Obrigado.
@Guill_Alb Further information has also been provided via DM. Thank you in advance.

@Guill_Alb Hi! Although we understand your dissatisfaction with the time taken in processing the refund of the missing value, we inform you that it is already being handled and will be approved very soon. We appreciate your patience at this time.

@PatriciaToht Hello Patricia,
the declaration, one for each passenger, has been sent by email. 
We apologise for the delay on the conclusion of your request.

Thank you ✈️
